outputs.output_descr: Office of Climate Change has the capacity to develop climate change adaptation, mitigation policy and coordinate activities to address initiatives on climate change.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The UN Collaborative Programme on Reducing Emissions from Deforestation & Forest Degradation in Developing Countries (UN-REDD) was created to assist developing countries to build capacity to reduce emissions & to participate in a future REDD+ mechanism.

project_descr: United Nations Climate Change Programme Support to Government of Papua New Guinea
